GSD.description:
block, bfq: replace 0/1 with false/true in bic apis

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.11 by commit b2e181cf9e57cec9e739efb191014e8fd8ec6ec0. For more details please see the references link.
